directions: Combine nectarines, bell pepper, onions, jalapeno pepper, and cilantro in a bowl. Stir in lime juice, olive oil, salt, and cayenne pepper.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap. Refrigerate to let flavors develop, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
Before serving, stir in black pepper. Add a pinch more salt, if needed.
ingredients: 1/2 cup finely diced red bell pepper
1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
title: Chef John's Nectarine Salsa
